Name: Ahmed MANSOUR
AboutMe:
• Expert in Java/JEE and SOA as well as .Net technologies :

    • JEE: JSP, Servlet, Struts, JSF/Richfaces, EJB, JPA/Hibernate, Spring Core, Spring AOP, Spring Batch, Acegi Security, Spring Security, JAAS, LDAP, Quartz, JMS, Ant, Maven, SOAP UI, JUnit, AspectJ, EhCache, Apache Lucene, Apache Tika, IBM WebSphere, JBoss, Apache Tomcat.
    • .NET : ASP.Net, ADO.Net, IIS, ASMX, WCF ...
    • Web Services : Apache CXF, SOAP, REST…
    • ETL: Talend Open Studio for Data Integration.
    • Design and modeling: IBM RSM, Rational Rose, PowerAMC, Merise, UML.
    • NoSQL: Apache Cassandra, Netflix Astyanax.
    • Continous integration: Continuum, Archiva, Sonar, Maven and Subversion.

  • Worked in different Business Domains : Bank, loan, insurance, industry, management and human resources.

  • Autodidact in learning and practicing Enterprise Architecture (IAF), SOA architecture, SOA Governance and System Integration based on middleware (EAI/ESB) such as BizTalk, MuleESB, Spring Integration, Apache Camel and ActiveMQ.

  • Practicing SOA Governance using WSO2 Governance Registry: services, contracts, policies and lifecycle management...

  • Autodidact in learning and practicing Business Process Management and BRMS using Bonita BPM (BPMN2.0), JBoss Drools...

  • Certified in Enterprise Architecture IAF, Integrated Architecture Framework Practitioner's Level A.

  • Interest in using lightweight agile software development framework, process and methodology such as Scrum and XP.

  • Reading technology books and white papers :

    • Spring Recipes A Problem-Solution Approach (2nd Edition) by Apress -ISBN : 978-1-4302-2500-3
    • SOA Governance in Action REST AND WS-* ARCHITECTURES - ISBN : 978-1-61729-027-5
    • Maven: The Definitive Guide (1st Edition) by O’Reilly - ISBN : 978-0-596-51733-5
    • The Integrated Architecture Framework Explained by Springer - ISBN : 978-3-642-11517-2
    • White papers from Smile, Valtech and Xebia specially Architecture, SOA and BPM topics.
